caption.p:
Effect of various doses of (a) butanol soluble fraction of A. tenuifolius (BS-AT) and (b) dichloromethane soluble fraction of A. tenuifolius (DS-AT) in anesthetized normotensive rats on systolic blood pressure (SBP), diastolic blood pressure (DBP), and mean blood pressure (MBP). Results are stated as mean ± SEM, whereas
∗ = P < 0.05 and
∗∗∗ = P < 0.001 as compared to the normal saline-treated group.
